reviewText: Prompt service and delivery. Well priced. International delivery. A pleasure doing business with. I will return to this business for future dealings. 100% satisfaction!

I enjoyed this film. The acting was great and I was entertained the entire time. Mia Sara and Billy Zane are wonderful and there is mystery,suspense,action,and romance in the film. I recommend the set up to anyone looking for a good action film.

Great movie. Many of the special effects were precursors to those used in later movies like Entrapment. I loved James Coburn and thought the movie had enough twists and turns to keep me on the edge of my seat. I definately recommend buying this movie. Well worth it....
